00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00030 
00031 // privileges checking
00032 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('stock_take', 'r');
00033 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('stock_take', 'w');
00034 
00035 if (!($can_read AND $can_write)) {
00036     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to access this area!').'</div>');
00037 }
00038 
00039 // check if there is any active stock take proccess
00040 $stk_query = $dbs->query('SELECT * FROM stock_take WHERE is_active=1');
00041 if ($stk_query->num_rows < 1) {
00042     echo '<div class="errorBox">'.__('NO stock taking proccess initialized yet!').'</div>';
00043     die();
00044 }
00045 
00046 // file upload
00047 if (isset($_POST['stUpload']) && isset($_FILES['stFile'])) {
00048     require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_FILE/simbio_file_upload.inc.php';
00049     // create upload object
00050     $upload = new simbio_file_upload();
00051     $upload->setAllowableFormat(array('.txt'));
00052     $upload->setMaxSize($sysconf['max_upload']*1024);
00053     $upload->setUploadDir(FILES_UPLOAD_DIR);
00054     // upload the file and change all space characters to underscore
00055     $upload_status = $upload->doUpload('stFile');
00056     if ($upload_status == UPLOAD_SUCCESS) {
00057         // write log
00058         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'stock_take', $_SESSION['realname'].' upload stock take file '.$upload->new_filename);
00059         // open file
00060         $stfile = @fopen(FILES_UPLOAD_DIR.$upload->new_filename, 'r');
00061         if (!$stfile) {
00062             echo '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00063             echo 'parent.$(\'stUploadMsg\').update(\'Failed to open stock take file '.$upload->new_filename.'. Please check permission for directory '.FILES_UPLOAD_DIR.'\');'."\n";
00064             echo 'parent.$(\'stUploadMsg\').className = \'errorBox\';'."\n";
00065             echo 'parent.$(\'stUploadMsg\').setStyle( {display: \'block\'} );'."\n";
00066             echo '</script>';
00067             exit();
00068         }
00069         // start loop
00070         $i = 0;
00071         while (!feof($stfile)) {
00072             $curr_time = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
00073             $item_code = fgetss($stfile, 512);
00074             $item_code = trim($item_code);
00075             if (!$item_code) {
00076                 continue;
00077             }
00078             $update = @$dbs->query("UPDATE LOW_PRIORITY stock_take_item SET status='e', checked_by='".$_SESSION['realname']."', last_update='".$curr_time."' WHERE item_code='$item_code'");
00079             $update = @$dbs->query("UPDATE LOW_PRIORITY stock_take SET total_item_lost=total_item_lost-1 WHERE is_active=1");
00080             $i++;
00081         }
00082         fclose($stfile);
00083         // message
00084         echo '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00085         echo 'parent.$(\'stUploadMsg\').update(\''.__('Succesfully upload stock take file').$upload->new_filename.', <b>'.$i.'</b>'.__(' item codes scanned!').'\');'."\n"; //mfc
00086         echo 'parent.$(\'stUploadMsg\').setStyle( {display: \'block\'} );'."\n";
00087         echo '</script>';
00088     } else {
00089         // write log
00090         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'stock_take', 'ERROR : '.$_SESSION['realname'].' FAILED TO upload stock take file '.$upload->new_filename.', with error ('.$upload->error.')');
00091         echo '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00092         echo 'parent.$(\'stUploadMsg\').update(\'Failed to upload stock take file! <div>Error : '.$upload->error.'</div>\');'."\n";
00093         echo 'parent.$(\'stUploadMsg\').className = \'errorBox\';'."\n";
00094         echo 'parent.$(\'stUploadMsg\').setStyle( {display: \'block\'} );'."\n";
00095         echo '</script>';
00096     }
00097     exit();
00098 }
